casebody.data:
Matthew Rancosky, Administrator dbn of Estate of Leann Rancosky, Matthew Rancosky, Executor of Estate of Martin L. Rancosky
v.
Washington National Insurance Company, as Successor by Merger to Conseco Health Insurance Company, f/k/a Capital American Life Insurance Company NO. 127 WAL (2016) Supreme Court of Pennsylvania August 30, 2016

PETITION FOR ALLOWANCE OF APPEAL

Denied.
